markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 11"
    pfs="Restricted"
>
[Golden Goose](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1643)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Cursed" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=274" />
<trait label="Evil" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=64" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 160</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This life-sized, hollow, golden goose statuette has an open, fanged mouth and an unsettling aura of hunger. [Fiends](/Traits.aspx?ID=70) sometimes present it as a gift to mortals whose greed makes them susceptible to temptation. While the _golden goose_ can be used without malice, those who possess such a thing often find its glittering lure erodes their morals over time.

<document level="2" id="action-1247" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Golden Goose
